function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Geography-restricted communications of health devices limit data sharing and disease monitoring.","Impact":"Reduced ability to monitor and respond to contagious diseases across different locations.","Mitigation":"Standardization of protocols and networks to facilitate seamless data sharing and communication.","Technologies":"Integration of health devices into a single network, development of standardized communication protocols.","People":"Population in areas with restricted device communication, public health officials and policymakers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, technology companies, policymakers."},{"Description":"Separate corporations maintaining unique data processing standards limits interoperability and data sharing.","Impact":"Fragmentation of data systems hinders effective disease surveillance and response.","Mitigation":"Establishing standardized data processing and sharing protocols, promoting interoperability among different devices and systems.","Technologies":"Development of interoperable data processing standards, integration of diverse systems into a unified network.","People":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies, technology companies.","Owner":"Public health agencies, technology companies, policymakers."},{"Description":"Lack of standardized protocols and networks hinders effective surveillance and response to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inefficiency in data collection, accuracy, and response to disease outbreaks due to fragmented systems.","Mitigation":"Creation of standardized protocols for data sharing, development of centralized surveillance networks.","Technologies":"Standardized communication protocols, creation of centralized surveillance networks.","People":"Public health officials, healthcare providers, population in areas with fragmented surveillance systems.","Owner":"Public health agencies, technology companies, policymakers."}]}
